name: The Last Pangalodean
description:
The evil pangolins (in spaceships for some reason) are trying to exterminate all the pangalodeans, confused that they even exist, as they are just a preposterous misspelling of their name.

But the last pangalodean escaped, and is fighting back... (in his own spaceship, for some reason)

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to shoot

Current High Score (submitted by Akira)
